column4: is there a linux-friendly news site with video?  i missed the presidential address at 9:00, and i really want to see it....and despite all my efforts, i still have trouble with cnn.com's video
this is something to the browser not to linux
just use mozilla browser rather than firefox
or add the plugin if any in for that media player
what's the command for mozilla browser?  i'm not sure if i have it installed...
what version of linux you are using ? ubuntu ?
then most likely you are using konqueror
i was using firefox...will cnn video work in konqueror?
i think you better download Mozilla Browser
then install real player plugin and flash plugin
